-- CSS ---

*{
    font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
    margin: 0 ;
    padding: 0; 

    :focus{
        outline-color: red;
        outline-width: 1px;
        outline-style: 1px outset;
    }
     
}

body{
    background-color: rgb(236, 236, 236);
  
}

%centralizar-linha {
    display: flex ;
    flex-direction: row ;
    justify-content: center ;
}

%centralizar-coluna {
    display: flex ;
    flex-direction: column ;
    justify-content: center ;
}


%titulo-cartao{
    text-transform: uppercase ;
    font-weight: 600 ;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #CC092F;
    margin-top: 15px;
}





.main-cartoes{
    @extend %centralizar-linha ;
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;

    .container {
        @extend %centralizar-linha ;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        width: 960px;
        height: auto;
        margin: 0 0 150px 0;

        & header {
            position: relative;
            display: inline-block ;
            min-width: 100%;
            border-bottom: 5px solid rgb(119, 119, 119);
        }
    }

    &__titulo{
        padding: 30px 0 0 30px;
        color: rgb(41, 41, 41);
        font-size: 46px;
        // line-height: 26px;
    }

    &__descricao{
        font-size: 20px;
        font-weight: 300;
        padding: 0 0 30px 30px;
        color: rgb(41, 41, 41);
    }

    

}


.container-cartoes{
    display: flex ;
    flex-direction: row ;
    flex-wrap: wrap ;
    justify-content: space-evenly ;
    margin-top: 50px;
}

.box-cartao{
    position: relative;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    z-index: 1;
    width: 230px;
    height: 355px;
    margin: 15px 25px;
    padding: 0 15px 0 15px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    background-color: #fff;

    -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 19px 24px -25px rgba(0,0,0,0.75);
    -moz-box-shadow: 0px 19px 24px -25px rgba(0,0,0,0.75);
    box-shadow: 0px 19px 24px -25px rgba(0,0,0,0.75);

    &:hover{
        transition: 0.5s;
        transform: scale(1.03);
    }

    &__top{
        position: relative;
        display: flex ;
        flex-direction: row ;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: space-between ;
        padding-top: 10px;

        & .tipo-cartao {
            font-size: 8px;
            // font-weight: 600;
            color: rgb(85, 85, 85)
        }
    }

    &__thumb {
        position: relative;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        padding: 10px 30px 10px 30px ;
        max-width: 147px;
        
        overflow: hidden;    
        border-bottom: 0.015em solid #EAEAEA;

        & img {
            width: 100%;
            max-height: 97px;

            &:hover{
                transform: scale(1.1);
            }
        }
    }

    &__nomeCartao{
        @extend %titulo-cartao;
        display: inline-block;
        width: 100%;
        text-align: center ;
        height: 33px;
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    &__vantagens {
        position: relative;
        
    }

    &__listaVantagens {
        box-sizing: border-box;
        margin-top: 10px;
        max-height: 70px;
        padding: 0  10px;
        overflow: hidden;
        height: 68px;

        & li {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: row;
            align-items: center;
            text-decoration: none;
            list-style: none ;
            font-weight: 300 ;
            font-size: 11px;
            margin-bottom: 5px;

            &::before{
                content: "" ;
                display: inline-block;
                width: 4px;
                height: 4px;
                border-radius: 50%;
                margin: 0 6px;
                background: #CC092F;

            }
        }

    }

    &__btn-saiba{
        position: relative;
        display: inline-block;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        width: 70px;
        height: 11px;
        padding: 10px;
        margin-bottom: 10px;
        background-image:  url('data:image/png;base64,');
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: 50% 50%;

        &:hover{
            transform:  translateX(-50%) scale(1.2);
        }
    }

    &__flag-container{
        position: relative;
        min-width: 100%;
        height: 35px;
        overflow: hidden;
        border-top: 0.015em solid #EAEAEA;
    }

    .bandeira-elo {
        position: relative;
        display: inline-block ;
        width: 50px;
        height: 35px;
        background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,');
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
    }

    .bandeira-visa{
        position: relative;
        display: inline-block ;
        width: 50px;
        height: 35px;
        background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,');
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
    }

    .bandeira-mastercard {
        position: relative;
        display: inline-block ;
        width: 30px;
        height: 35px;
        background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,');
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: 50%;
    }

    .bandeira-america-express {
        position: relative;
        display: inline-block ;
        width: 30px;
        height: 35px;
        background-image:     url('data:image/png;base64,');
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: 50%;
    }

    ~ .cartao-indisponivel {
        &::before{
            content: "Indisponível";
            width: 137px;
            position: absolute;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 5px 0 0 0;
            height: 25px;
            left: -30%;
            top: 44%;
            -webkit-transform: translateX(-50%);
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            display: inline-block;
            z-index: 5;
            background-color: #CC092F;
            color: white;
            transform: rotate(-90deg);
            font-size: 16px;

       }
    }

}
